summary: Completed comprehensive testing of EduTrack application features including JWT login, bulk edit scores, role templates, and SMS template editor. All requested features are working correctly.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized requests

passed_tests: Three-dot menu correctly excludes edit scores
SMS template editor with Arabic/English support
All CRUD operations (classes, students, users, roles)
Notifications and SMS templates backend APIs
